annotation_sentence: I see... many thing. Like, um, Golden Gate Bridge and... Alcatraz.
rationale: The word 'thing' should be in plural form 'things' to agree with the quantifier 'many'.

annotation_sentence: Yes, I do one tour. It was... about history of Alcatraz.

annotation_sentence: Yes, um, I eat... clam chowder in... uh, bread bowl? And seafood.

annotation_sentence: Uh, little bit. I buy some... um, souvenirs for family.

annotation_sentence: It was... um, four days. Not very long, but good time.
